column1: tîn (also appearing as tin and tĭn) is a Sindarin word meaning "spark
column2: sparkle (esp. used of the twinkle of stars)" or "spark

column1: tîn (or tínen) is a Sindarin word meaning "silent
The unattested form tîn is commonly held to mean "his (of nonsubject)" in Neo-Elvish
